title: Exam Wishes
description: Examination week are the hardest. Exam Wishes is our initiative to buy your friends some welfare pack and support each other.

title: Subcom Bonding Day
description: Let’s bond with others! Subcommittee Bonding Day (SCBD) is an opportunity for us to know each other—all across portfolio over GTD—better while cruising around Singapore. Prizes were waiting for winning team!

title: Night Cycling
description: Cruise around Singapore’s night landscape after tremendously busy week! Chill with your friends in our Night Cycling event during recess week. We’d chance to have supper at the iconic Lau Pa Sat, too. Experience you’d never forget!

title: Canvassing
description: Bulk your volunteering experience together with us! Canvassing is one of our fundraising event to being manpowers during a marathon event. Let’s have some run!

title: Subcom Recruitment
description: First, we we gear up and select committees for the next GTD event. Choose the portfolio that speaks to your soul, and let's embark on this incredible adventure together.
